<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Lion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2866)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Lions are cooperative hunters, ambushing dangerous prey in groups of lionesses that work in tandem to trap and kill, bringing food home to their prides. Male lions are typically larger, with long manes, and when they hunt, they tend to do so on their own.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Lion.webp" />
</column>

</row>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet Skills Acrobatics 8, Athletics 9, Stealth 10

**Languages**

**Skills**

<row gap="medium">

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d10+6 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 slashing

**Pack Attack**   The lion deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the lion's allies.

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The lion Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the lion began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79), it remains hidden until after the ability's Strike.

**Sneak Attack**   The lion deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>
